text: Mucormycosis, also known as black fungus, is a serious fungal infection. It is spread by spores of molds of the order Mucorales. It usually occurs in people who have a weak immune system. It is a rare but dangerous infection. It is caused by a group of molds called mucormycetes. It often affects the sinuses, lungs, skin, and brain. == References == Category:Fungal diseases
title: Mucormycosis
